format.title: Energise.me Energy Barometer
format.subtitle: Let's see how you have progressed recently. 1 is always the worst possible score and 10 is the best!

1.name: energised_rating
1.title: On a scale of 1-10, how energised do you feel?

2.name: stress_rating
2.title: On a scale of 1-10, how stressed do you feel? (1 = Highly Stressed, 10 = not stressed at all)

3.name: productive_rating
3.title: On a Scale of 1-10, How productive have you been feeling?

5.name: solving_rating
5.title: How resourceful are you at solving problems and overcoming tasks that initially look impossible?

6.name: physically_fit_rating
6.title: On a scale of 1-10, how physically fit would you consider yourself?

7.name: fteen_minutes_amount
7.title: On average, how often do you exercise for more than 15 minutes each week? (1 = Less than once, 2 = 1-2 times, 3= 3-4 times, 4 = 5-6 times, 5 = More than 6 times)

8.name: weight_rating
8.title: Do you consider yourself to be the right weight? (1 = Well Underweight, 2 = A little under, 3 = about right, 4 = A little over, 5 = Very Overweight)

9.name: eating_well
9.title: On a scale of 1-10, how well do you think you eat?

10.name: hydrated_rating
10.title: On a scale of 1-10, how well do you stay hydrated?

11.name: bad_stuff_rating
11.title: On a scale of 1-10, what about the bad stuff? (Alcohol, ciggies and recreational drugs) Come on be honest now! 1 = Very Regular user, 10 = I don't touch the stuff

12.name: sleep_rating
12.title: On a scale of 1-10, how well do you sleep?

13.name: sleep_length
13.title: On average, how many hours sleep have you been getting a night?

14.name: purpose_a_meaning
14.title: Do you have a clear sense of purpose and meaning?

18.name: financially_secure
18.title: On a scale of 1-10, How financially secure do you feel?

19.name: job_secure
19.title: On a scale of 1-10, How secure do you feel in your job?

20.name: present_focus
20.title: On a scale of 1-10, Is your mind usually clear of distractions so that you can focus on being present in the moment?

21.name: anxious_rating
21.title: On a scale of 1-10, How anxious have you felt over the last month? (1 being Extremely Anxious, 10 being not anxious at all)

22.name: setbacks_overcome
22.title: On a scale of 1-10, how well do you overcome setbacks and challenges?

23.name: displaying_emotions
23.title: On a scale of 1-10, how well do you control your negative emotions and feeling in front of others? (1 = I don't control them, 10 = I keep a really cool head)

24.name: emotions_personal_effect
24.title: On a scale of 1-10, how much do you allow your negative emotions and feelings affect you as a person? (1 = I really let them affect me, 10 = they don't affect me at all)

25.name: tribe_nurture
25.title: At work, on a scale of 1-10, how much do you nurture your tribe?

26.name: tride_greatness
26.title: At work, on a scale of 1-10, how great is your tribe?

27.name: home_tribe_nurture
27.title: Now your home tribe, on a scale of 1-10, how much do you nurture your home tribe?

28.name: home_tribe_greatness
28.title: Still with the home tribe, on a scale of 1-10, how great is your home tribe?

35.name: form_feedback
35.title: Let us know anything that you feel affected your scores
